mapper.insert: insert into family (fidnum, fname, ftel, pidnum, faddress) values (#{fidnum},#{fname},#{ftel},#{pidnum},#{faddress} )
mapper.select: SELECT f.fname as name , f.ftel as tel , f.faddress as address , f.fidnum as id FROM patient p , family f WHERE 1=1 AND p.pidnum = f.pidnum AND p.pidnum = #{pidnum}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM family WHERE 1=1 AND fname = #{fname}
mapper.update: update family set fname = #{fname} , ftel = #{ftel}, faddress = #{faddress} where fidnum = #{fidnum}
